name: Bakkatown Belize
details: Rebuilt a new hostel web app having a centralized booking management system plus a more user-friendly UI for their clients.

name: XML Parser
details: Parsing XML files with my own Abstract Data Types (ADT) for a stack, queue, linked list and array list.

name: Sorting Out Sorting
details: Sorting the three comparison types from large to small using six sort algorithms.

name: Battleship Game
details: Based on the battleship board game.
Two people can play the game remotely and in real time.

name: Chat in Titanic
details: Several people can participate in this application and become characters in the movie Titanic and talk to people.

name: JK Sports Club
details: The website is to manage sports club information, reviews and members.

name: Manage Computers
details: CLI(Command-Line Interface) based program for managing computers.
Various Java security technologies are applied

name: Movie TS Backend API
details: Back-end API created with NestJS to manage movie lists.
Create, read, update or delete (CRUD) movies to the list.

name: TypeScript Blockchain
details: Simple application of the basic concept of blockchain and includes various validation.
